channel.title: Can someone give me the corect skillcape hoods and/or capes (t)
channel.description:
Hello, I have been trying to get the correct skillcape hoods and (t)s for a while now... I cant get the colors righ for the hoods and i cant even get 1 skillcape (t) to work. I am also havig trouble adding items from 7672+ for some reason, when I add an item that is 7672 I get boxing gloves instead of the item I made... So please help me out here!
Thank you, -Zaron
